name: TV
description: The client, an unemployed single mother with a 8 yrs old daughter and with mental health conditions, will be relocating to a new flat. They require a TV as the current one is not functioning, but client is facing financial difficulties in replacing one. Thank you so much for your involvement in helping the client and her daughter transition to a fresh start. Please contact me @9724 4034 *Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor.

passiton.name: Samsung 48" TV
passiton.description: Good in condition , included wall mount
passiton.location: Farrer Park, Little India, Serangoon Road

name: Single bed frame
description: Elderly man living alone in public rental flat requests for single bed frame. He already has a mattress.

name: Bed frame
description: The client is a homemaker with 5 school-going children, aged between 25 â€“ 3 years old.  Her husband aged 48 has suffered from bipolar disorder since he was 18 years old.  He later suffered from a stroke in Jan 2024 and passed away on 15 March due to a heart attack. Currently, the assistance provided barely covers their basic food and necessities. The family of 6 living in an HDB 3-room flat and they sleep on the mattress on the floor.

passiton.name: Foldable Single Bed Frame
passiton.description: Foldable single bed frame. As shown in photo 3, one side of the mesh is abit warp but usable.

name: Sofa bed
description: Client is a single mother with a 10-year-old son living in a rental flat. Due to low income, they cannot afford a new mattress even though the current one has started to smell. Therefore, they plead with donors to donate a double sofa bed (considering that the rental flat doesn't have separate rooms, space is limited). We would be extremely grateful if the donor can cover the delivery costs. Please contact Hsin Yu via WhatsApp messages at 8911 8058 or email: hsinyu_lee@viriya.org.sg to liaise.
